Section Formula

  1. Let O (0,0) be the origin and \(P(x_1 , y_1)\) and \(Q(x_2 , y_2)\) are two points and if A divides line segment joining P and Q internally in m:n, Then coordinates of A (x,y) are:

    2. x = \({mx_2 + nx_1}\over (m+n)\)

    Similarly,

    y = \({my_2 + ny_1}\over (m+n)\)

  2. Special Case : If A is mid point, then m=1 and n=1

    3. x = \({1\times x_2 + 1\times x_1}\over (1+1)\) = \({x_2 + x_1}\over 2\)

    x = \({1\times y_2 + 1\times y_1}\over (1+1)\) = \({y_2 + y_1}\over 2\)
